participant_1.background:

i have aspergers.
i am married with three kids.

I wake up, take my dog, Collie, for a walk and then drink the day away.

I've been lucky enough to avoid any physical altercations in my lifetime.
i am a shy person but i love to sing.
i have 3 thumbs.
my favorite food is macaroni and cheese.
I keep up with my family but I am not always sure if they keep up with me.

content.text: How's your day going so far?
It's going well, thank you for asking. How is yours?
My day is going well too. I just woke up and took my dog for a walk.
That's great! I love taking walks with my dog.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy.
I love golden retrievers! They're such sweet dogs.
They are! Buddy is the best dog I've ever had.
I'm sure he's a great dog. I'm looking for a home with a large room to build my models in.
That sounds like a lot of fun! What kind of models do you build?
I build model airplanes and cars. I've been building them since I was a kid.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to build model airplanes.
It's not too difficult. There are a lot of great tutorials online.
I might have to look into that. It sounds like a fun hobby.
It is! I love it. It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I'm sure it is. I'm definitely going to look into it.
